reuters.title: OVERLAND EXPRESS INC <OVER> YEAR LOSS
reuters.body: Shr loss 9.31 dlrs vs loss 1.62 dlrs Net loss 16.2 mln vs loss 2.8 mln Revs 99.4 mln vs 96.5 mln NOTE: 1986 includes loss of 3.9 mln dlrs from restructuring. NOTE: loss 1986 includes 3.9 mln dlrs for restructuring costs associated with disposal of property. Loss also includes the sale-at-a-loss of the company's aircraft. Reuter 
